ABOUT US

The Lush School of Design's workshops aim to provide accessible, hands-on learning experiences, focusing on empowering creativity, practical skill enhancement, and inclusivity. They encourage innovation and the formation of a design community, striving to empower individuals to play a pivotal role in creating a more beautiful and sustainable world through creativity and leadership.
